name: Shooter (itch)
description:
*Can be played in your Android, Windows, HTML & Unity.

You was trapped in a Submarine. To save your life is to shoot all the robots (enemies) which will appears around you. The robots are your enemies. It'll comes in a varieties sizes from big to small.

Features:
* Spin around using your clever touch control/mouse.

* Use button move up, down, right & left to move up, down, right or left side.
* Shoot the enemies using your futuristic gun pack.

* Just shoot any doors to enter & move on your survival journey.

* Your life will ended when your battery backpack which you're carry behind goes into red color.

Good luck! Survive your life!
